argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_zringbas | |- ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` ZZring ) = ( .g ` ZZring ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zsubrg | |- ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-zring | |- ZZring = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_subggrp | |- ( ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) -> ZZring e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_mp1i | |- ( T. -> ZZring e. Grp ) |
| 9 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( T. -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 10 |  | #P_ax1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 11 |  | #P_cnfldmulg | |- ( ( x e. ZZ /\ 1 e. CC ) -> ( x ( .g ` CCfld ) 1 ) = ( x x. 1 ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( x e. ZZ -> ( x ( .g ` CCfld ) 1 ) = ( x x. 1 ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` CCfld ) = ( .g ` CCfld ) |
| 15 | 14, 6, 2 | #P_subgmulg | |- ( ( ZZ e. ( SubGrp ` CCfld ) /\ x e. ZZ /\ 1 e. ZZ ) -> ( x ( .g ` CCfld ) 1 ) = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 16 | 5, 13, 15 | #P_mp3an13 | |- ( x e. ZZ -> ( x ( .g ` CCfld ) 1 ) = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( x e. ZZ -> x e. CC ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_mulid1d | |- ( x e. ZZ -> ( x x. 1 ) = x ) |
| 19 | 12, 16, 18 | #P_3eqtr3rd | |- ( x e. ZZ -> x = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( z = x -> ( z ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( z = x -> ( x = ( z ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) <-> x = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( x e. ZZ /\ x = ( x ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) -> E. z e. ZZ x = ( z ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 22 | #P_mpdan | |- ( x e. ZZ -> E. z e. ZZ x = ( z ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( T. /\ x e. ZZ ) -> E. z e. ZZ x = ( z ( .g ` ZZring ) 1 ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 2, 8, 9, 24 | #P_iscygd | |- ( T. -> ZZring e. CycGrp ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_trud | |- ZZring e. CycGrp |
